snippet: City representatives met with league officials and asked questions about the size of a proposed stadium, how often it would be used and what facilities would be available for the public.
abstract: Officials from Major League Soccer meet officials from the Hudson River Park Trust to discuss a potential stadium on Pier 40 on the West Side of Manhattan.

byline.original: By KEN BELSON and CHARLES V. BAGLI

lead_paragraph: City representatives met with league officials and asked questions about the size of a proposed stadium, how often it would be used and what facilities would be available for the public.

headline.seo: M.L.S. Stadium at West Side’s Pier 40 Is Discussed
headline.main: M.L.S. Discusses Arena at West Side’s Pier 40
